dataset: Enrolments - Full Year and Teaching Period

detailData.detailDescription: Detailed analysis of Equivalent Full-Time Student Load (EFTSL) and Headcount Enrolments over recent years, broken down by key demographics.
detailData.detailsText: This page provides a deeper dive into the enrolment trends presented in the flagship report. The time series chart illustrates the fluctuation of Domestic vs. International EFTSL, highlighting growth periods and potential impacts of external factors. The bar chart further breaks down the most recent year's enrolments by School, offering insights into the distribution of students across different academic areas. Note that this data is illustrative and synthetically generated for demonstration purposes.
